changeSet.author: mh
changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE public.bnkseek ( vkey varchar(8) NOT NULL, real varchar(4), pzn varchar(2), uer varchar(1) NOT NULL, rgn varchar(2) NOT NULL, ind varchar(6), tnp varchar(1), nnp varchar(25), adr varchar(30), rkc varchar(9), namep varchar(45) NOT NULL, namen varchar(30) NOT NULL, newnum varchar(9) NOT NULL, newks varchar(9), permfo varchar(6), srok varchar(2) NOT NULL, at1 varchar(7), at2 varchar(7), telef varchar(25), regn varchar(9), okpo varchar(8), dt_izm date NOT NULL, cks varchar(6), ksnp varchar(20), date_in date NOT NULL, date_ch date, vkeydel varchar(8), dt_izmr date, CONSTRAINT vkey_pk PRIMARY KEY(vkey), CONSTRAINT "bnkseek_real_fk" FOREIGN KEY ("real") REFERENCES "public"."real" ("real") ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE RESTRICT, CONSTRAINT "bnkseek_pzn_fk" FOREIGN KEY ("pzn") REFERENCES "public"."pzn" ("pzn") ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE RESTRICT, CONSTRAINT "bnkseek_uer_fk" FOREIGN KEY ("uer") REFERENCES "public"."uer" ("uer") ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE RESTRICT, CONSTRAINT "bnkseek_rgn_fk" FOREIGN KEY ("rgn") REFERENCES "public"."reg" ("rgn") ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE RESTRICT, CONSTRAINT "bnkseek_tnp_fk" FOREIGN KEY ("tnp") REFERENCES "public"."tnp" ("tnp") ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE RESTRICT,
CONSTRAINT bnkseek_uk UNIQUE(newnum) );

changeSet.author: mh

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from pg_indexes where schemaname = 'public' and tablename = 'bnkseek' and indexname = 'bnkseek_add_index_real_ix';

changeSet.sql: CREATE INDEX CONCURRENTLY bnkseek_add_index_real_ix ON public.bnkseek USING btree (real);
